peril.model.states

Class Fortify

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • peril.model.states.ModelState
        • peril.model.states.Fortify

  • public final class Fortify
extends ModelState
    The logic for the ModelState where current ModelPlayer can select one of their ModelCountrys then another provided that there is a path of friendly ModelCountrys between the two ModelCountry.
    Since:
    2018-03-15
    Version:
    1.01.07
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    ModelState

      • getPathBetween

        public java.util.List<ModelCountry> getPathBetween(ModelCountry start,
                                                   ModelCountry target,
                                                   ModelUnit unit)
        Retrieves the path between two path between two ModelCountrys ruled by the same ModelPlayer that the specified ModelUnit can traverse.
        Parameters:
        start - The ModelCountry where the path will begin.
        target - The ModelCountry where the path will end.
        unit - THe ModelUnit that will be transfered across the path.
        Returns:
        The path of ModelCountrys between the two specified ModelCountrys.

      • fortify

        public void fortify()
        Moves one unit from the primary ModelCountry to the secondary ModelCountry along the path between them determined by getPathBetween(ModelCountry, ModelCountry, ModelUnit).

      • transferAlongPath

        private void transferAlongPath(java.util.List<ModelCountry> path,
                               ModelUnit unit)
        Transfers the specified ModelUnit across all the ModelLink between all the ModelCountrys on the path.
        Parameters:
        path - The List of ModelCountrys that connect two ModelCountrys.
        unit - The ModelUnit that will be transfered across the path.

      • canTransfer

        private boolean canTransfer(ModelCountry country)
        Retrieves whether or not ModelUnits can be transfered between the currently selected primary ModelCountry and the specified ModelCountry.
        Parameters:
        country - The ModelCountry that could be selected.
        Returns:
        Whether or not ModelUnits can be transfered between the currently selected primary ModelCountry and the specified ModelCountry.

      • isPath

        private boolean isPath(java.util.Deque<ModelCountry> path,
                       java.util.Set<ModelCountry> travsersed,
                       ModelCountry current,
                       ModelCountry target,
                       ModelUnit unit)
        This method will using a Set of traversed nodes (aka ModelCountry) recursively perform a depth first search from one node to another. If a link between two ModelCountrys does not allow the specified ModelUnit to be transfered (ModelLink.canTransfer(ModelUnit, ModelCountry, ModelCountry)) then the link will to be used in the path.
        Parameters:
        path - The current path of the search.
        travsersed - The Set of ModelCountry that have already been traversed.
        current - The ModelCountry currently being checked.
        target - The ModelCountry that will result in the path being complete.
        unit - The unit that will be transfered across the path.
        Returns:
        Whether the current ModelCountry is on the path to the target ModelCountry.
        See Also:
        ModelLink, Deque
